content:
Vaanoraartthoreeshan shuddhan shuddhan shuddhan
Garddabhamereetterushalemaarnnon parishuddhan.

Paadin paadin paadin puthrasthothram nithyam
Sthothram maathram nin kartthavyam maunam vendaa.

Sehyone! Haa! Ninnaal mannan thallllappettu;
Ooshaanaayaal keertthicheedum sabhaye! Bhaagyam.

Baalanmaarum vrddhanmaarum pattakkaarum
Sthree purushanmaar ooshaanakallaal vaazhttheedunnu.
